#### Computational Biologist | Multi-Omics & AI for Translational Medicine

Hi, My name is Jason and I’m a computational biologist who works at the intersection of biology and data. I’m passionate about turning complex datasets into insights for toxicology, neuroimmunology, and translational medicine.
